conversionRules.description:
Sample conversion rules.
A template applies to a particular node type in the structMap. A template specifies the relationships that should be inferred from the node of interest to other nodes in the hierarchy.
The value of nodeType is a string indicating a div TYPE. If nodeType is "*", the template applies to all nodes.
The value of kinType is one of the following:
parent | ancestor | sibling | child | descendant

objectTemplate.description: Specifies a "contains" relationship between a "folder" and any child.
Specifies a "hasAncestor" relationship from any node to all ancestors.
Derives several work-related relationships from a tree containing people and various corporate entities.
